scene_description_enriched: A man with a long white beard, dressed in a blue robe and a golden cloak, stands with his hands raised in prayer towards a divine figure emerging from a tree. The background is a deep blue sky filled with golden stars. Below the tree, a flock of sheep gazes upwards. The divine figure, also with a white beard and a halo, appears to be speaking or bestowing a blessing. This scene depicts a pastoral setting with a divine visitation.
